strapiJob.title: TheatreSquared Apprenticeship
strapiJob.description:
TheatreSquared Apprenticeship 

TheatreSquared is seeking enthusiastic, early-career, theatre professionals to join our summer and season apprenticeship programs. These positions are paid weekly and work full-time hours during the programâ€™s time frame.

  • TheatreSquared Apprentice Program: Fall 2023 - Spring 2024
  • TheatreSquared Apprentice Program: Summer 2023 - Arkansas New Play Festival (ANPF) 

Review these apprenticeship opportunities on our website: https://theatresquared.bamboohr.com/jobs/
